title: Erasmus Bridge
description: A modern architectural marvel known as 'The Swan', offering picturesque views of the city and river.

title: Cube Houses
description: An innovative set of cubic houses designed by architect Piet Blom, a unique and artistic residential area.

title: Witte de Withstraat
description: A vibrant street known for its contemporary art galleries, street art, and cultural venues.

title: Boijmans Van Beuningen Museum
description: A museum with an impressive collection of fine arts, including works by Van Gogh, Dali, and Rembrandt.

title: Kunsthal
description: An art gallery hosting a variety of exhibitions ranging from contemporary to classical art.

title: Luchtsingel Bridge
description: A crowdfunded pedestrian bridge featuring colorful, modern design, connecting different parts of the city.

title: Markthal
description: A market hall with an impressive ceiling mural, combining food, art, and architecture in one location.

title: Het Park
description: A historic park offering scenic views and home to the Euromast, a tower with an observation deck.

title: Westelijk Handelsterrein
description: A complex of restored warehouses now housing galleries, restaurants, and shops, showcasing industrial art.

title: Fenix Food Factory
description: A food market in a former warehouse, blending culinary arts with a vibrant community space.
